nodes.text: The Road to Renewal, also known as the Path of Pilgrimage, was a roadway that led through the Serenity Valley in the Old Paths region of the planet Voss to the Shrine of Healing. The Pilgrim Retreat was located along the roadway.
The Road to Renewal appears as a location in the Old Paths on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
